Method Detail

load

public abstract void load(java.lang.String fileName,
                          FeatureDefinition featDefinition,
                          java.lang.String[] setFeatureSequence)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Load the cart from the given file

Parameters:
fileName - the file to load the cart from
featDefinition - the feature definition
setFeatureSequence - a sequence of features for indexing the feature vectors. Used to initialise a FeatureFileIndexer but unused in the case of an actual CART tree.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if a problem occurs while loading

interpretToNode

public Node interpretToNode(Target target,
                            int minNumberOfData)
Passes the given item through this CART and returns the leaf Node, or the Node it stopped walking down.

Parameters:
target - the target to analyze
minNumberOfData - the minimum number of data requested. If this is 0, walk down the CART until the leaf level.
Returns:
the Node

interpret

public java.lang.Object interpret(Target target,
                                  int minNumberOfData)
Passes the given item through this CART and returns the interpretation.

Parameters:
target - the target to analyze
minNumberOfData - the minimum number of data requested. If this is 0, walk down the CART until the leaf level.
Returns:
the interpretation

getFirstLeafNode

public LeafNode getFirstLeafNode()
Get the first leaf node in this tree. Subsequent leaf nodes can be called via leafNode.getNextLeafNode().

Returns:
the first leaf node, or null if the tree has no leaves.

replaceLeafByCart

public static Node replaceLeafByCart(CART cart,
                                     LeafNode leaf)
In this tree, replace the given leaf with the given CART

Parameters:
cart - the CART
leaf - the leaf
Returns:
the ex-root node from cart which now replaces leaf.
